p: All solvents and chemicals used in the study were analytical grade. Ultraviolet (UV) absorbance for determining antioxidant was observed using Genesys UV-Vis Spectrophotometer and microplate reader. TLC analysis on precoated Si-gel plates (Merck Kieselgel 60 F 254, 0.25 mm) and detected by UV light (254 nm) and by CeSO 4 spraying reagent. Vacuum liquid chromatography (VLC) was carried out using Merck Si-gel 60. Methanol, sucrose, saline water, and dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) from Merck. Rat intestinal acetone powder, glucose kit, NaOH, acarbose, HCl, phosphate buffer (pH 6.9), and porcine pancreas Î±-amylase enzyme from Sigma Company.
